# Home Page - Professional Profile
# Primary URL
https://waqasahmad-portfolio.web.app/
Description: Waqas Ahmad - Top Software Engineering Consultant, Software Engineering Specialist, and Best Software Engineering Expert with 17+ years of experience. UET Lahore graduate (Computer System Engineering). Professional Software Engineering Services provider and IT Engineering Consultant specializing in reliable, enterprise-grade, mission-critical solutions with zero-downtime, high-availability, scalable architectures. Expert in .NET, Azure Cloud, microservices, SSL/TLS security, real-time processing, high-performance systems, distributed systems, and large-scale enterprise projects. Available for remote work globally (USA, Europe, Global).

# Featured Project Pages
https://waqasahmad-portfolio.web.app/projects/heat-exchanger
Description: Heat Exchanger Portal - Mission-critical, enterprise-grade, reliable microservices platform built with .NET Core, Azure Service Fabric, and Vue.js. Zero-downtime, high-availability, scalable architecture with SSL/TLS security, real-time processing, and high-performance capabilities. Handles billions in maintenance costs for top 5 oil & gas company.

https://waqasahmad-portfolio.web.app/projects/airasia-id90
Description: AirAsia ID90 Employee Travel Discount System - Large-scale, enterprise-grade, reliable microservices application serving 20,000+ employees. Mission-critical system with zero-downtime, high-availability, real-time processing, and high-performance architecture. 99.9% uptime, processing 3,000+ transactions daily.
